domain
Class Collisions

java.lang.Object
  domain.Collisions

public class Collisions
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class implements methods for detecting collisions, detecting Collisionable instances in determinated areas, detecting visible Collisionable instances for a determinated Collisionable, etc.

Nested Class Summary
static class Collisions.CollisionDirection
          Enumeration containing possible collision directions, where the ANY value can be used to specify all of them.
static class Collisions.CollisionType
          Enumeration containing various generic collision types

Method Detail

instantiate

protected static Collisions instantiate(Phisics phisics)
This method is used to get a Collisions instance following the Single-Town model

Parameters:
phisics - The Phisics instance wich is invoking the Collisions object.
Returns:
a Collisions instance.

checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable collisionable1,
                                                              Collisionable collisionable2)
This method checks if two Collisionable objects intersects. First their zIndex are checked, and if they are equals their collisionable areas are asked for intersection.

Parameters:
collisionable1 - the first Collisionable instance
collisionable2 - the second Collisionable instance
Returns:
true if the Collisionables intersects. false otherwise.

checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable causable,
                                                              Action action)
This method checks if an Action executed by a Collisionable has collisioned with any Collisionable instance from the collisionables ArrayList. If a collision is produced, then the collisioned instance is told that it has received a collision. This method first checks if the collisionables ArrayList is out dated.

Parameters:
causable - The Collisionable instance wich executed the action
action - The Action executed
Returns:
true if the Action executed has produced an intersection collision with any Collisionable instance from the collisionables ArrayList. false otherwise.
See Also:
checkIfCollisionablesOutDated(), tellCollisionToCollisionableCollisioned(domain.interfaces.Collisionable, domain.interfaces.Action, domain.interfaces.Collisionable)

checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable collisionable,
                                                              Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                                              Collisionable collisioned)
This method checks if a Collisionable wich is moving in a direction collisionate with another.

Parameters:
collisionable - The Collisionable instance wich is moving
direction - The current CollisionDirection of the collisionable
collisioned - The Collisionable instance to examine for collision
Returns:
true if the collisionable wich is moving in the current direction intersects with the collisioned. false otherwise.
See Also:
checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(domain.interfaces.Collisionable, domain.interfaces.Collisionable)

checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision(Collisionable collisionable1,
                                                                       Collisionable collisionable2)
This method checks if any of the collisionable1 collisionableAreas intersects any of the collisionable2 collisionableAreas.

Parameters:
collisionable1 - the first Collisionable instance
collisionable2 - the second Collisionable instance
Returns:
true if any of the collisionable1 collisionableAreas intersects any of the collisionable2. false otherwise.

checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision(Collisionable collisionable,
                                                                       Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                                                       Collisionable collisioned)
This method checks if any of the collisionable1 collisionableAreas intersects any of the collisionable2 collisionableAreas at a specified direction.

Parameters:
collisionable - The Collisionable instance wich is moving
direction - The current CollisionDirection of the collisionable
collisioned - The Collisionable instance to examine for collision
Returns:
true if any of the collisionable collisionableAreas wich is moving in the current direction intersects with the collisioned. false otherwise.

checkCollisionableTileCollision

public static boolean checkCollisionableTileCollision(Collisionable causable,
                                                      Action action,
                                                      Tile tile)
This method checks if an Action executed by a Collisionable has collisioned with any Collisionable instance within the Tile tile. If a collision is produced, then the collisioned instance is told that it has received a collision.

Parameters:
causable - The Collisionable instance wich executed the action
action - The Action executed
tile - The Tile instance wich is asked for an occupier
Returns:
true if the tile instance has an occupier. false otherwise.
See Also:
checkTileCollision(domain.Tile), tellCollisionToCollisionableCollisioned(domain.interfaces.Collisionable, domain.interfaces.Action, domain.interfaces.Collisionable)

checkPointCollision

public static boolean checkPointCollision(Collisionable c,
                                          java.awt.Point p)
This method checks if a Collisionable contains a Point at his collisionableArea.

Parameters:
c - The collisionable instance to be asked for containment
p - The Point instace requested for it's containment
Returns:
true if the Collisionable instance contains the Point.

checkScenarioLimitsCollision

public static boolean checkScenarioLimitsCollision(Collisionable collisionable,
                                                   Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                                   Scenario scenario)
This method is used to check if a Collisionable instance is collisionating with a Scenario instance limits. If it's at, or passes the limits it's told.

Parameters:
collisionable - The collisionable instance to check if it's out of the scenario limits.
direction - The direction in wich the collisionable is moving.
scenario - The Scenario instance from wich to get the limits
Returns:
true if the collisionable instance has reached or passes the Scenario limits for the specified direction. false otherwise.

checkScenarioCollisionableAreasCollision

public static boolean checkScenarioCollisionableAreasCollision(Collisionable collisionable,
                                                               Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                                               Scenario scenario)
This method is used to check if a Collisionable instance is collisioning with any Scenario instance collisionableAreas.

Parameters:
collisionable - The collisionable instance to check if it's out of the scenario limits.
direction - The direction in wich the collisionable is moving.
scenario - The Scenario instance from wich to get the collisionable areas
Returns:
true if the collisionable instance intersects any of the scenario collisionable areas in the specified direction. false otherwise.

checkScenarioFallingCollisionPlatformGame

public static boolean checkScenarioFallingCollisionPlatformGame(Collisionable collisionable,
                                                                Scenario scenario)
This method is used to detect if there's ground down the collisionable.

Parameters:
collisionable - The collisionable instance to check if it's falling in a PlatForm game.
scenario - The Scenario instance from wich to get the collisionable areas
Returns:
true if the collisionable instance intersects any of the scenario collisionable areas in the SOUTH direction. false otherwise.

checkPointCollision

public static boolean checkPointCollision(java.awt.Point point)
This method checks if any of the collisionable instances contains the passed Point.

Parameters:
point - The point to check for being contained by a collisionable.
Returns:
true if any of the collisionable instaces conatins this Point. false otherwise.

checkPointCollision

public static boolean checkPointCollision(java.awt.Point initial,
                                          Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                          java.awt.Point end)
This method checks if an end point is going away at a specified direction. This method doesn't really check if two Point collisionate.

Parameters:
initial - The initial Point
direction - The direction to check if the end Point is going on.
end - The end Point
Returns:
true if the end Point is at the specified direction from the initial. false otherwise.

checkTileCollision

public static boolean checkTileCollision(Tile tile)
This method checks if a Tile object is occupied or not by a Collisionable.

Parameters:
tile - The Tile instance to check for a Collisionable containment.
Returns:
true if tile has an occupier. false otherwise.

checkSurfaceCollisionablesCollision

public static boolean checkSurfaceCollisionablesCollision(java.awt.Rectangle collisionableArea,
                                                          Collisions.CollisionDirection direction,
                                                          java.awt.Rectangle collisionedArea)
This method is used to check if a Rectangle surface collisionates with with the opposite from another Rectangle.

Parameters:
collisionableArea - The first Rectangle instance.
direction - The direction in wich the first Rectangle should be checked for intersection with the opposite from the second. (f.e.: if direction is NORTH, the upper Rectangle1 surface will be checked with the bottom Rectangle2 surface)
collisionedArea - The second Rectangle instance.
Returns:
true if the first Rectangle surface collisionates with the opposite from the second. false otherwise.

getVisibleCollisionables

public static java.util.ArrayList<Collisionable> getVisibleCollisionables(Collisionable visionable)
This method is used to obtain all the Collisionable instances that are inside a Collisionable visible area.

Parameters:
visionable - The Collisionable instace to ask for it's visible area
Returns:
a Collisionable ArrayList containing the visible Collisionable instances for the visionable.

getCollisionablesInArea

public static java.util.ArrayList<Collisionable> getCollisionablesInArea(java.awt.Rectangle area)
This method is used to obtain all the Collisionable instances that are inside a Rectangle.

Parameters:
area - The Rectangle instance to check for it's contained Collisionable instances.
Returns:
a Collisionable ArrayList containing the Collisionable instances in this Rectangle.

getCollisionableAtPoint

public static Collisionable getCollisionableAtPoint(java.awt.Point point)
This method look for a Collisionable intance at the given Point.

Parameters:
point - The Point at wich a Collisionable instance is asked to be.
Returns:
The Collisionable instance from any of the the collisionables ArrayList wich contains that Point. null if any Collisionable was found at the given Point.

setCollisionablesToOutdated

protected void setCollisionablesToOutdated()
This method tells the Collisions instance that it should update it's collisionables when it has a chance.
